description: Exploitation of the operation data of vehicle doors using AI to monitor operation and identify abnormal behaviors. Implementation of predictive maintenance strategies that allow detecting and anticipating equipment failure. Increased    availability of equipment.

Smart European Space Access through Modern Exploitation of data science. Demonstrate the ability of European space companies to work together and reduce costs using data science for predictive quality, predictive maintenance and supply chain agility.
Vineyard Innovative Tool based on the InteGration of Earth Observation Services and in-field Sensors.
To improve urban management of wastewater, stormwater and flooding events by introducing novel digital services in an adaptive interoperable open-source platform for smart water management.
